name: Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Systems
membership:
OECD IT Advisory Council
ISO/IEC/ITU e-Business Memorandum of Understanding Management Group
goal: OASIS is a nonprofit consortium that drives the development, convergence and adoption of open standards, open code and open data for the global information society.  OASIS is one of the largest and oldest standards consortia in the Internet and ICT domain.  OASIS promotes industry consensus and produces worldwide standards for cybersecurity, the Internet of Things, cloud computing, energy, e-commerce, content technologies, emergency management and crisis response, and other areas.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
(1) ICT Standardisation policy, e.g., Regulation EU 1025/2012
(2) Digital Single Market initiatives
(3) Inter-government and government-to-business (G2B) Open Data requirements and regulations
(4) NIS (cybersecurity) Directive
(5) Data Protection Regulation
